reviewtext: I needed an additional hub or switch to run from my Wireless DSL/Cable Router (which only had 1 PC/Uplink Port).  This switch worked great, and seemed to be priced comparable to many hubs, which would have worked fine for me, but obviously not given the benefits of the switch.If you need to add a few more computers to your existing network, this product is great.
summary: Works Great, and Easy to Install
